name: Lauren Cottrell Staggs
text: Bob and Kathy were wonderful to work with. They paid attention to every detail on my endless wish list and were able to design a gorgeous home for us. They were both very patient with changes, easy to communicate with and got back to us quickly with changes. We highly recommend them!

name: Aimee Bryars
text:
What a delightful experience it was to work with Bob and his asisstant,Jessi, in planning my new house! This, being the fourth house I have built,was the best designer with whom I have worked. Bob and Jessi's sole aim was to please me and design the house I wanted. They showed great patience in achieving that goal.

Aimee Scott

name: Lauren Cottrell Staggs
text: Bob and Kathy were wonderful to work with. They paid attention to every detail on my endless wish list and were able to design a gorgeous home for us. They were both very patient with changes, easy to communicate with and got back to us quickly with changes. We highly recommend them!

name: Tommy Lawrence
text: Good architectural firm

name: Scott McNelley
text: Many, many wonderful projects with and for the firm. Always a delight.

name: Tommy Lawrence
text: Good architect

name: Charlotte White
text: Very professional

name: Charlotte White
text: Professional

name: Jamie Turner
text: Very nice customer service and reasonable prices ,very good inventory

resp.text: Thank you Jamie :) We have the BEST customers!

name: lexi hardin
text: James and Company has a fantastic selection of reclaimed woods. I was very impressed with both the staff and the inventory. All my questions were answered politely and with great detail. Their prices are more than reasonable. If you are looking for reclaimed wood for any project this is the place to go.

name: Amy Snider
text: This place is amazing. No trees were cut down and the antique wood is beautiful. The staff are extremely helpful through the whole process. If you you're looking for quality, customer serious and true its word wood then this is the place to go! I highly recommend this to my friends and spread the word. These guys know what they're doing and it shows!! Thanks James and Co.

name: Mountain Valley Kennels
text: I have done business with the company for years. They have a wonderful selection of lumber. Unlike anything you'll find in the southeast. Wonderful staff, they always treat you like family and answer any questions you have. If you want something beautiful and unique, this is the company for you!

name: Tracy Petrie
text: Great company.  Excellent selection of product,  and wonderful customer service.  I got everything I needed,  and couldn't have asked for a better experience!

name: Brea' Cozart
text: Love this place, everyone is super friendly and helps me out in every way they can. The prices are amazing and quality is great. I don’t go anywhere else but to James and company. I recommend to everyone

name: Ronnie Osborn
text: Great place. Great Family!!!!!  Very easy to locate. Wonderful products. If you are trying to find hard to find lumber.  Give them a call.

name: James Miller
text: I have known these people for several years and the wood products they sell are well worth the price.  They have been very helpful and in no way rude to anyone. I will continue to do business with them. Shannin has always been helpful and cheerful.

name: Roy C Wells
text: I have been using James and Company for approximately 10 years, they have always been very professional, carry a large line of products and they have one of the best  and very accommodating  staffs.  That I have ever worked with !

name: Melanie Miller
text: I've known the owners of James & Company for years ! I luv that they reuse wood from all over the country ! Unique woods from all over . If your looking for different look no farther !

name: Daniel ciotta
text: This is a great company with awesome customer service.   They are wonderful people and offer a great product at very competitive prices!

name: Nicole Betz
text: This is a great company with great customer service. I have been there many times and have never been disappointed!

name: Deanna Ciotta
text: Very Helpful!!! Great prices!!!! Great quality stuff love this company

name: Timothy Abney
text: Awesome place with alot of interesting items inside and outside.Good place to visit on a Saturday morning!

name: Greg Pennington
text: I have seen some really really Innovative stuff come from these folks. I have never used them personally

name: Daphne Ballard
text: Welcoming, nice atmosphere

name: Marie Boyer
text: Great people work in this office! 😁

name: ConstructNoden
text: Great group

name: Shanna Jennings
text: I am very happy with the stock plan that we purchased and had amended. Initially it was going to be a few small changes, and it turned into a much larger project than anyone anticipated. Throughout all the changes, the team was responsive and quickly turned changes around for approval. They even worked with my builder to finalize a few details that he needed to show for permit purposes. I am hoping that we are building our forever home, but if not, I would not hesitate to use ERDD again. Money well spent.

name: Holland Dixon
text: They took our vision and produced a work of art allowing me to refine my future building project. Correcting things we didn't see or hadn't thought of and highlighted useful addition needed to be functional. Very professional, always responsive and overall a GREAT company to work with!

name: Renée Dates
text: Multiple phone calls and messages left for a job. All calls are screened and no one will follow-up with repeated requests for assistance. The poor reviews are absolutely correct - THEY DO NOT CALL OR FOLLOW-UP! BEWARE OF THIS COMPANY!

resp.text: You are a customer of our client Bama Sheds. We have been in contact with Bama Sheds.  If  they have not been in contact with you that is not something we can control.

name: Kristie Potts
text: Absolutely terrible. I paid a deposit for future home plans. I was very descriptive when speaking to Christy about my plans- One level barndo, specific interior layouts and sq ft. She explained to me that they certainly could design my plans. I paid a deposit, sent the EXACT exterior structure of what I wanted, along with additional interior layout and door. I heard nothing for several weeks, with many phone call attempt. I received a random email apologizing for the delay, that a family member had an illness. Weeks go by again with no returned calls. Finally, I requested they return my deposit and I would outsource a more reliable designer. I recently received another random email with some generic sketches that were nothing of mine. I responded and asked them if they were able to adequately provide services.- NO RESPONSE. I have since then called multiple times, left multiple messages in request to have my deposit refunded. As of today, I have reported them and contacted my bank. After reading reviews and doing further research( I should have prior to hiring them)I see the EXACT same scam happening over and over. What a waste of my time, money and energy!

resp.text: The project was delivered late but we did provide two options based on the client provided sketch and exterior she was looking for.

name: Brent Timmerman
text:
BEWARE! DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THESE PEOPLE!

I will spare the specifics of my experience, However I will warn any prospective person interested to please read the reviews. They ( The bad reviews)are highly accurate !
These people will take your money, and disappear from communication.  With the exception of lying to you through messenger app.. And then when you are able to contact them from a different phone number that they are not screening,  they will blame you for their VERY UNETHICAL business dealings . With that being said, I have nothing to gain from this review,  however I am out 400.00 for services that I never received,  And based on reviews that I have now read. Christy ( The Owner ) will counter this review saying she refunded my payment, which she lied about on the phone with me , because I followed up with Discover ( My financial source ) and Square ( Her financial source  ) and both confirmed to me that no such transaction had taken place!  These people use every excuse in the book to get away with taking your hard earned money and giving you ABSOLUTELY NOTHING IN RETURN.

STAY AWAY!!!!

LOOK BELOW TO OWNER'S RESPONSE
ITS ALL LIES TOO !!
TRUST. ME

name: Joe Wilson
text:
Very nice people who do excellent work at fair prices.

I plan to use them again soon on another project.

name: Chris Gourley
text: We are happy with our plans from ERDD. They did their best to help us to design our forever home and we are happy with the end results. They were willing to make many changes to the original design which shows they are willing to go the extra mile to make their customers happy. They came to our home initially to see where the house would be built and we had our finished plans within 2 1/2 weeks. They could have finished much quicker but my wife and I made a lot of changes so we went thru about 11 drafts to get to the finished project. The fact that they were willing to work with us to this extent means we would use them again if we ever need an architect again.

name: Jackie Wirth
text: Not an actual client, but based off the repeated and disappointing testimonials of others... I would suggest avoiding this company.  The accusations, articles, and evidence provided are so concerning that these individuals should be investigated.

resp.text: The others that have make claims against us have either been refunded or they did receive their plans and still asked for refunds. There are two sides to every story. I will gladly share any evidence supporting our side of these claims as well if you would like. Our email is listed on this page and my cell phone is (256) 595-1574 If you like further information.

name: Jessica Logan
text: Amazing to work with! They took our general ideas and produced our dream home! Highly recommended!!

name: Tina Johnson
text: Some people have growing pains and are not always right in the way they handle things. Yes Elaine Roberts Drafters and Designers May I made mistakes. But they delivered my plans to me and in a reasonable time. Not everyone is perfect. Some people only want to bash people with negative reviews.

name: Drue Poynter
text: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE SERVICE! We have tried to get in contact several times after sending our deposit. It has been 4 weeks and they have not been able to give us anything. After posting a bad review on Facebook they told us we would have our plans by the end of the week and NOTHING! I would not recommend them to anyone! After reading more reviews this seems to be very a common thing for them!

resp.text: Sir you are not even a customer of ours.

name: Yvette Moss
text: We love these guys! They were very helpful and wanted us to achieve the dream home we were after and never complained about how many times I called! =) I will use then again for other projects if we ever need this type of service!!

name: Jennifer Parent
text: Super helpful with the design and floor plan of my 1500sq foot barndominium style stick built home. Very patient with my multiple requests for desired changes. We are very grateful and would greatly recommend.

name: Kat Lange
text: Our construction plans came in today and I am beyond excited to start working on building our home together! Elaine Roberts Drafters & Designers went above and beyond to make every single edit to our plans and help us design our perfect dream home. If you know anyone needing house plans this is hands down the best people to go to on all aspects, I cannot say enough about how blessed we are to have worked with them for our barndo design!! Thank y’all!!!

name: Kieth Dunn
text: Reading all these bad reviews reminds me of my experience, which has been going on for four months so far with no resolution. I have had all the same difficulties that the others have described and then some....way too may to list here. I cannot express strongly enough how disgusted I am with these people who proclaim christian doctrine in their emails and website. By the way, the good reviews are from the Parker family, which is another name that they go by.

name: Jaycie Phillips
text: Awful customer service! They will not respond even after payment of house plans!

resp.text:
I do not believe that you are an actual client, but friends with Derrick Loftis. Mr. Derrick Loftis has been issued a refund per his request, he also received plans/drawings in the past.

Thank you
Jimmy Parker

name: Luke Barker
text: Highly recommend Elaine Roberts Drafters and Designers for all your design needs.

name: Barbara Gray
text: I would have to say this is the worst attempt of blueprints I have ever seen. Nothing was to scale, there was no detail information at all, and was not the design we had ask for. Measurements were not all noted. We have had a hard time trying to figure out what we need but thanks to Shaw Building Supply they had to basically redraw in order to estimate the material. These people are not draftsmen at all.  This was just a waste of $1500. I could have drawn this plan better than they attempted to.

resp.text: Ms. Gray, I am sorry you were not satisfied with the plans you received from us. You approved the design and layout prior to the completion of the plans. Per our contract you were allowed to make additional changes as you need/wanted. If you had made attempt to reach us over the discrepancy in the plans we would have address and worked with Shaws on any changes or information that was needed. We provide cad files to all building suppliers per there request on a regular basis. None of which was made by Shaws or yourself.

name: Kelsie Norris
text: Elaine was a pleasure to work with on our recent home designs..

name: Andrew Bales
text:
These guys are big no shows! Wasted three or four weeks of my time and did nothing. If you are looking for extra stress, headaches and to p-off your client, then call Elaine Roberts drafting.

REGARDING ELAINE ROBERTS REPLY. That is right I gave you the project told you its urgency and instead of saying "we are too busy to take on projects" you said nothing until weeks had passed and my emails went unanswered. This outfit needs to grow up and learn some business ethics.

resp.text:
Mr. Bales,
It is hard for us to be late on a project we were never hired for. We provided us informaton for a quote and timeline for your project. We sent several emails to you and your office for clarification on a few items, all with no response. It is not our fault that your lack of communication caused your client to be upset with you. Nor could would have completed work on your project without the proper go ahead from you.

name: Creekside Designs
text: We have been working with Jimmy off and on for six months now & he has been very quick and professional. I had to make several changes and Jimmy was prompt and delivered the correct drawings that we needed. I would highly recommend Elaine Roberts Drafters and Designers

name: David Vermeulen
text:
We paid a deposit and had a verbal contract to design drawings for permit ready construction plans on 2/3/2019
I received zero updates from ERD&D, we reached out dozen of times per email & phone only to be given the run around. Actually spoke once with Elaine Roberts herself I believe and still no follow up or follow through. As of today 12/11/2019 we are still waiting on a response or communication of any kind. I called and left a message today, lets see if we get any response
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Response from the owner 3 weeks ago
Mr. Vermeulen.
I am sorry that you feel like you slipped though the crack somewhere. We made numerous attempts to contact you thought out the year with no response from you. I will gladly refund your deposit if you would like. Response from the owner 3 weeks ago
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After leaving a review, an email and voicemail with my contact info on 12/11/19 and requesting a refund, I am still waiting for Elaine Roberts to get back to us.
2nd request 1/2/20 - Elaine please refund our deposit.

resp.text:
Mr. Vermeulen.
I am sorry that you feel like you slipped though the crack somewhere. We made numerous attempts to contact you thought out the year with no response from you. I will gladly refund your deposit if you would like. I will be in touch with you this morning to work out the solution that works best for you.

name: Christy Leigh
text: They are amazing! Loved the whole process and they made it so easy and wonderful. Very accommodating to all our changes.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We enjoyed working with you on your home.

name: Paul Hines
text: Great people to work with.

name: Jimmy Parker
text: Great small little design firm. Husband and wife team that works hard on each project. They are not perfect and have flaws but the work and designs they produce are top notch.

name: Mark Hamm
text: Great work at a reasonable price.  Having some delays in the delivery of the plans is the only reason for not getting a 5.

name: Nona Muss
text:
So last year I found a business on a local small business group Facebook page - Elaine Roberts Drafters and Designers. I paid them a deposit of $250. As of today, the work has not been delivered. It was promised 10 days after payment. As of today, they are 100 days past due. I posted an honest review on their Facebook page, starting off by saying I hoped I could change it to a positive review in the near future. They changed their Facebook template to not allow reviews so mine could no longer be seen. They always say they are working on my plan and they will have something in a few days. Then I don't hear from them and nothing is ever delivered. Their Facebook page has photos they post- and therefore imply that the work depicted is their own. Through reverse photo look up I found photos they had "lifted" from other sites and I contacted the owners. Indeed they did not have permission to use the photos and it was not their work. When I tagged the owners in the misused photos they were promptly deleted from the Elaine Roberts drafters Facebook page. One of the owners of the business from which they had plagiarized the photos of others' work, did know Jimmy Parker - one of the owners of Elaine Roberts Drafters. He told me specifics of how the owner (Jimmy) of Elaine Roberts Drafters worked for him previously and had stolen from him, and described him as one of the biggest con-men he has encountered. Perhaps occasionally they deliver a product enough to keep up an image, I don't know, but after my own experience and what I heard from Jimmy Parker's previous employer, I sure wouldn't trust him with my money again!

Also look at their other reviews. Jimmy and Christy Parker are the husband/wife team that “own/operate’ this business they call Elaine Roberts Drafting and Design. (These are their respective middle names.)  Previously they operated under the name “Creekside Designs.” I guess they had to give up on that name after they accumulated so many bad reviews. You can google it. Anyway, three of the other reviews for this business are from the owners themselves (Christy Parker, Jimmy Parker, and their old business named Creekside Designs. A fourth is from a family member - Sheila Parker. So half of the reviews contributing to their “4.1” rating are ones THEY CREATED RATING THEMSELVES! They did the same thing on Yelp until I reported them and Yelp notified me they had removed those reviews because they violated their terms.

resp.text:
Mrs. Hall,
I am terribly sorry for the poor customer service that we provided.  We are not scammers, crooks, or anything of that nature.  We simply took on to much work at one time. It is not an excuse but we are still learning how to deal with our blessing of growing pains.  We are human and make mistakes.   I am terribly sorry that your project fell through the cracks.  In regards to your refund we asked for a mailing address to process you refund and I have not yet received it.

Again we are sincerely sorry for the poor customer service and wish you all the best in the future.
Respectfully,
Christy Parker

name: Christy Parker
text: The team at Elaine Roberts is very professional and there work is top notch

name: Anna Dean
text: These guys are amazing no matter what location you are at . South Alabama has brick , tile and stone and everything you need to make any job complete !

name: Robert Ironfeather
text: Where else is someone to get brick from, the know it, can get or find what ever your want of brick is, even an old classic standard "old Chicago" brick.

name: Brian Weaver
text: We stop by just to look at brick samples because we aren't from the area. We are building in Cincinnati. They were quite helpful even though they knew we we're not going to be buying from them. We actually took their advice and decided to go with a chocolate brick mortar on our home in Ohio. If I lived in that area this will be the only place I'd go to.

name: Gojko Tramosljanin
text:
18 min for unload
Fast in and out

name: Tony Marzullo
text: Highly recommend Forrest Daniell. Very knowledgeable and always a quick turnaround on all work.

name: Billy McLeod
text: Very professional and easy to work with. Great insight on all types of projects.

text: Best, most reliable Architectural firm in Southeast Alabama.

name: Miguel

text: Fifth Dimension is a full service architectural firm that can work with any client's needs.  It is a great place to not only practice architecture and work.

name: B B
text: Avoid at all costs. This man did my roof with two different colors and then tried to tell me time would help them match up.

name: Jessica Dingler

text: Real good place to deliver to, extra nice people to work with!!!

name: Ray Frye
text: Nice folks, great service

name: Craig Winn
text: Robert is a great guy who is very interested in his clients. Also seems to appreciate his consultants. Great architecture firm.

name: Craig Winn
text: Great group of talented Architects.

name: Craig Winn
text: Enjoyed meeting Corey, Ryan and Jeff. Great group of guys.

name: Craig Winn
text: Love to work with Vic. Experienced architect who is very interested in his clients projects.

name: Becky Champion
text: personable very easy to communicate with. helpful ideas and great personalities!!  Can't wait to see it finished!

name: Craig Winn
text: Great group of professionals service north Alabama with experienced architectural services.

name: Dirk Baeuerle
text: Best value priced Architect in town. Home town Architect, born here and raised here. Auburn grad. Very friendly and caring. Very knowledgeable. Need a house or business designed or remodeled, come by and talk to Jock Leonard, your hometown Architect.

name: Nathan Brock
text: I’ve worked with Joc and Leonard Design on several projects and can’t recommend them highly enough.

name: Randy Swann
text: I have personally known Bill Whittaker for 25 years and I have had the pleasure of working with his Architectural Firm on several occasions.  We have always been impressed with his level of skill, accountability, and professionalism.  I would highly recommend Bill Whittaker Architecture, AIA, to anyone that is needing to retain the services of an excellent Architect.

name: Nathan Wight
text: BWA has done an incredible job with our project.  He is extremely knowledgeable and helped guide us through a very complex process.  They go above and beyond what is required of them to make sure that the owner is pleased with the result.  I would highly recommend BEA for any project big or small.

name: Sylvia Bentley
text: Great experience.  This company believes in TEAM work and was so willing to deal with all the parties that was involved to get the job done.  I would highly recommend this company to anyone.

name: Craig Winn
text: I visited Bill’s office and was impressed with the large amount of work generated in a  small place. This is a testament to his architectural skills.

name: David Mitchell
text: Bill is great to with. He always looks out for your best interest.

name: Brandon Butler
text: Mr. Bill Whitaker did fantastic work for me, he's very knowledgeable and patient. Overall I had a very good experience.

name: Garrett Counseling

name: Caleb Fearing
text: This architecture firm does incredible work! Jimmy, Frank, Greg, and Wes are all trustworthy men of honor and integrity. I had the privilege of working here for three years in my career. They train and treat their employees with respect and are diligent to reproduce well-rounded young architects and interior designers.

name: Scott McNelley
text: Jimmy Seay & Frank Litchfield are talented and have a strong track record of outstanding work.

name: Kevin Allen

name: BA Grant
text: Excellent pricing for the type of architectural services receiving.  GREAT color renderings and clear and concise plans. I received 5 sets of construction plans with a 3d rendering of the front of my new home.  They also do additions and bath and kitchen designs.
